posts.post_title: Price Drops On HOF Tough Back & PSA 4 Gray (Sold). SL PSA 4 Lentz Added
posts.post_content:
For Sale:
Vic Willis Batting SGC 60 (5) With Difficult Cycle 460 Back.  Highest graded by SGC (highest graded by PSA is a 3.5).
Front looks like a 6 with excellent centering and very nice corners.  Back of card has partially 2 backs showing.  $1,950

Kid Elberfeld, NY PSA 3: Nice centering and corners with a small wrinkle in the red background over his head. Reverse of card has a wrinkle in lower left of Piedmont 150 back. SOLD

Dolly Gray, WA  PSA 4 Sweet Cap 350/30:  Small wrinkle on lower right corner of back. Front looks like a 5 with fine centering, very white borders and sharp corners.  SOLD

For Scans: Text me at (862) 266-4952.  Pics are loaded for quick response.
Payment: PayPal F&F, or Money Order.
